definitions.definition: (of a disease or disease-causing organism) likely to be transmitted to people, organisms, etc., through the environment.
examples: communicable, transmittable, transferable, spreadable, contagious; Moreepidemic; informalcatching; datedinfective "infectious disease"Moreepidemic; catching; infective infectious disease
the dogs may still be infectious

definitions.definition: likely to spread or influence others in a rapid manner.
